hero.description: I believe good code starts with understanding the need and ends with elegant simplicity.

aboutME.title: About Me...
aboutME.description: Passionate and Results-Driven Backend Developer with a B.Sc. in Computer Science. I bring to the table strong problem-solving capabilities, a passion for continuous learning, and a natural curiosity for exploring new technologies. Through challenging personal projects, I've gained practical experience in developing end-to-end solutions, excelling at data analysis and drawing meaningful conclusions. A proactive team player with excellent communication skills and a high degree of independence, I am eagerly seeking a challenging opportunity in software development where I can make a significant contribution, grow, and have an impact.
